data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Saint Peter, Montserrat today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Peter, Montserrat
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 137 believers find a person of peace today among the 362 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saint Peter, Montserrat a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Saint Peter, Montserrat that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Saint Peters
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Saint Peters, Saint Peter, Montserrat.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Saint Peter, Montserrat.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Saint Peter that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Saint Peter, Montserrat into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
